SELECT a.id, a.project_id, a.award_name, a.award_level, a.award_org, a.award_date, a.remark, p.project_code AS projectCode, p.name AS projectName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(rp.emp_no, '-', rp.name) SEPARATOR '，') AS awardPersons FROM research_award a LEFT JOIN research_project p ON p.id = a.project_id LEFT JOIN research_project_member pm ON pm.project_id = a.project_id LEFT JOIN research_person rp ON rp.id = pm.person_id
AND a.project_id = #{projectId}
AND a.award_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{awardName}, '%')
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT id, project_id, award_name, award_level, award_org, award_date, remark FROM research_award WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research_award(project_id, award_name, award_level, award_org, award_date, remark) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{awardName}, #{awardLevel}, #{awardOrg}, #{awardDate}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.project_id, a.award_name, a.award_level, a.award_org, a.award_date, a.remark, p.project_code AS projectCode, p.name AS projectName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(rp2.emp_no, '-', rp2.name) SEPARATOR '，') AS awardPersons FROM research_award a LEFT JOIN research_project p ON p.id = a.project_id LEFT JOIN research_project_member pm ON pm.project_id = a.project_id LEFT JOIN research_person rp ON rp.id = pm.person_id LEFT JOIN research_project_member pm2 ON pm2.project_id = a.project_id LEFT JOIN research_person rp2 ON rp2.id = pm2.person_id WHERE rp.id = #{personId} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.id ASC
